title: Ticket #4612: Auto-cluster wrong in condor_gangliad
description:
Not sure if this is in condor_gangliad or in the schedd ad...

The auto-cluster counts in Ganglia are currently all wrong. We report the number of unique auto-cluster numbers. However, each auto-cluster is only unique within the same owner. For example, if ToddT and BrianB both have 1 auto-cluster in the schedd, there would be 1 auto-cluster reported (as opposed to 2).

This effectively prevents us from monitoring auto clusters.
creator: bbockelm
